### Tender Details

The Government of Canada invites qualified Offerors to submit proposals for the delivery of one (1) micro distillation apparatus instrument that utilizes a spinning band and reflux to achieve a high number of theoretical plates.

The apparatus will be used for creating a sample of different fuel boiling ranges from hydrotreated and hydrocracked feeds to investigate co-processing and bio-upgrading by Natural Resources Canada.
